pages.text: $(li)Dispensers can fully interact with cauldrons!$(li)Elytras can be customized with dyes and banners. These can also be applies to individual wings if you separate them!$(li)Tridents received some QoL, including Loyalty ones coming back from the void!$(li)Bundles are craftable, and can be used to randomize blocks while building!

$(li)Explosions from other mobs no longer grief. All other mob griefing is turned on.$(li)Insomnia is disabled. If you want Phantoms, they spawn in certain End biomes!$(li)Grindstones can now remove enchantments from items and put them on books for a price!$(li)You can right-click crops to harvest them.
